description:
repro:

create an ami.tiny instance via ec2 api
list /servers via openstack api

result:
json response contains "name:" null instead of "name": <some string>

For the sake of a simple API spec, "name" should never be null.
title: servers created via ec2 api have no name in openstack api

For the sake of a simple API spec, "name" should never be null.
